title: [GAMEPLAY] Shadowfire Lamb Doesn't Sing
body:
This unfortunate 1350-RP-skin-dealbreaker is just what it says on the tin!  With Kindred's Shadowfire skin on, Lamb's incredibly adorable singing/humming audio doesn't play when she idles.  Oversight?

How to reproduce: Play Kindred with Shadowfire skin and literally do nothing.  Then play vanilla Kindred, literally do nothing, and wonder at the incredibly adorable singing you were missing out on.

replies.body:
Hey Bad Forecast! 

Thanks for the report! We'll see why Kindred is refusing to sing during their idle animations. :]
